channel.title: Split GPIO intensity
channel.description:
Hi,
I am trying to figure about how to split sensor values in order to create something similar to a morphing effect.
I am using a force resistor sensor and I want that it controles two oscillators' volume.
The whole range (0-64) for one oscillator and when it reaches 32 it should start to increase the volume of the other oscillator simultaneously scaling 32-64 into 0 to 64 starting to sound both together.
I have made some trials with math/>, scale... But I didn't find a satisfactory combination.
I really appreciate if someone could point me a nice solution in case it would be possible.
Thanks a lot in advance.

item.title: Split GPIO intensity
item.dc:creator: @MattilynMattroe
item.description:
@MattilynMattroe wrote:
